ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] 51+ bard gear
ygData.msgSnippet: Paid 1400pp for the dagger btw, dunno if that was a good price *shrug*.. Now Im trying to get rid of some of my other weapons Musiker ...
ygData.messageBody:
Paid 1400pp for the dagger btw, dunno if that was a good price *shrug*.. Now
Im trying to get rid of some of my other weapons

Musiker

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> Sent: 12. september 2002 13:06
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] 51+ bard gear
>
>
> ugh 17k way way too expensive for the carapace, mind you
> ayonae ro server is
> pretty messed up economy.
>
> harmonic dagger i gotta admit is one of the better weapons
> out there that is
> cheap. I loved mine, used mine for a long time, the stun/dd
> proc on it is
> pretty hard to beat when ya have high dex
>
> Minkin
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Henrik Holm [mailto:HEH@...]
> Sent: September 12, 2002 3:52 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] 51+ bard gear
>
>
> Ugh, I just saw one in the bazaar 17500pp.. way out of my liege..
> Well I bought a black enameled BP. Which I am trying to sell
> now for 800PP
> (bought it cheap)
> Must admit that i also bought an harmonic dagger :P Couldent
> help my self.
>
> Thanks for the suggestion Minkin, Anyone else have
> suggestions for upgrades?
> Im looking for stuff in the 1kpp to 2kpp range. Thats what I
> can afford..
> Btw any one got suggestions to where I could go at 51 for
> some nice exp?
> Is Velktors still good? or are there better places on luclin?
>
> Musiker
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> > Sent: 10. september 2002 15:39
> > To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] 51+ bard gear
> >
> >
> > ditch the lambent bp and go buy a phase spider carapace,
> > they're going for
> > dirt cheap these days in bazaar and they've got respectable
> > stats. I was
> > using one till i got my vindi bp
> >
> > Minkin
> > A Ro
> >
> >
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Henrik Holm [mailto:HEH@...]
> > Sent: September 10, 2002 2:55 AM
> > To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> > Subject: [eqbards] 51+ bard gear
> >
> >
> > Hi all,
> > I am returning to Norrath after a looong break.
> > I just bought Luclin and is in desperate need of equipment
> > upgrades. I plan
> > to try and dump some of my junk at the bazaar, but need some
> > advice on what
> > to buy and what to pay :)
> >
> > My standard gear is as follows:
> > - Singing steel boots
> > - Singing steel Gauntlets
> > - Sleeves of the Ancient
> > - Lambent BreastPlate
> > - Lambent Greaves
> > - 2x Opaline Earrings
> > - 2x Velium fire wedding rings
> > - Guardian helmet
> > - Spider fur coat
> > - Troll Hide belt
> > - Orc Fang necklace
> > Weapons:
> > - Journey mans walking stick
> > - Icepaw war claw
> > - Sarnak Skull splitter
> > - Smoldering brand
> >
> > I have a bunch of junk to sell apart from the above mentioned
> > thigns and
> > around 1700pp in cash.. I think I maybe can raise 3000pp if
> > Im lucky :/
> > Any suggestions for what to upgrade and what to pay for the
> > upgrades will be
> > greatly appriciated..
> >
> > Regards
> > Musiker, Minstrel of 51 songs
> >
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
> > > Sent: 7. september 2002 18:18
> > > To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> > > Subject: [eqbards] RE: Anyone out there?
> > >
> > >
> > > I'm still around but took the last 2 weeks off for back to
> > school and
> > > various other stuff. My plan was to get everything around the
> > > house caught
> > > up and maybe a bit ahead before PoP, but now it looks like I
> > > will need to
> > > get back on the raid horse. I really don't care for raid
> > > level stuff, all
> > > hurry up and wait. Plus I finally got a new job and have
> to log at a
> > > reasonable hour. Being on EST, that means I have to go about
> > > the time we get
> > > really started in VT or wherever. Songs are the only thing I
> > > care about
> > > having though so it's back to grind, I suppose.
> > >
> > > Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe 60 Bard
> > > Brilinia Ilsidi 54 wizard
> > > Brillinia Klagetsdautter 46 cleric
> > > Venator Sapentia, Xegony
> > >
> > >
